billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Requires sex offenders to verify their residence and registration on a biannual basis
summary: Requires sex offenders to verify their residence and registration on a biannual basis; the divisions shall mail a verification form to each registered sex offender on a different random date during each six month period of the calendar year.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring sex offenders to verify their registration with the sex offender registry on a biannual basis
